page.title: 13LOCAL HISTORY(cont)
page.content: When the Second World War started Kislingbury was swamped with evacuees from London.{Three schools}and staff arrived in Kislingbury.On{V.E.}day many celerbrations were held and the evacuees slowly drifted back to London. Since the war and particulary with the construction of the{M1}and the expansion of Northampton,the village has grown and some of the old landmarks have gone.Many newcomers have arrived and Kislingbury has expanded. { Kislingbury has changed alot in the {last 900 years,who knows what will {happen in the next 900 years.}
